Feareful neuues of thunder and lightning with the terrible effects thereof, which Almighty God sent on a place called Oluestone, in the county of Glocester the 28. of Nouember last : hauing prefixt before it, a short discourse, concerning two other admirable accidents that soone after ensued / truely related by P.S. ; and dedicated vnto the Kings Most Excellent Maiestie. P. S.
[30] p.
Printed by G. Eld, for Frauncis Burton, At London : 1606.
Signatures: A-C⁴ D³. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library. Includes bibliographical references.
